   16: 
   17: -module(conf_reload_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   22: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
   23: 
   24: -define(RELOADED_DOMAIN, ct:get_config(ejabberd_reloaded_domain)).
   25: 
   26: -define(SAMPLE_USERNAME, <<"astrid">>).
   27: -define(RELOADED_DOMAIN_USER, astrid).
   28: -define(INITIAL_DOMAIN_USER, alice).
   29: 
   30: -define(CTL_RELOAD_OUTPUT_PREFIX,
   31:         "# Reloaded: " ++ atom_to_list(ct:get_config(ejabberd_node))).
   32: 
   33: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   34: %% Suite configuration
   35: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   36: 
   37: all() ->
   38:     [{group, xmpp_domain_local_reload}].
   39: 
   40: groups() ->
   41:     [{xmpp_domain_local_reload, [],
   42:       [domain_should_change,
   43:        user_should_be_registered_and_unregistered_via_ctl,
   44:        user_should_be_registered_and_unregistered_via_xmpp,
   45:        user_should_be_disconnected_from_removed_domain]}].
   46: 
   47: suite() ->
   48:     [{timetrap,{seconds,30}},
   49:      {required, ejabberd_reloaded_domain} | escalus:suite()].
   50: 
   51: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   52: %% Init & teardown
   53: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   54: 
   55: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   56:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_suite(Config0),
   57:     ejabberd_node_utils:init(Config1).
   58: 
   59: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   60:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   61: 
   62: init_per_group(xmpp_domain_local_reload, Config0) ->
   63:     F = fun(Cfg) ->
   64:                 change_domain_in_config_file(Cfg)
   65:         end,
   66:     Config1 = create_user_in_initial_domain(?INITIAL_DOMAIN_USER,
   67:                                             Config0),
   68:     [{new_hosts_value, [?RELOADED_DOMAIN]},
   69:      {modify_config_file_fun, F} | Config1].
   70: 
   71: end_per_group(xmpp_domain_local_reload, Config) ->
   72:     delete_user_in_initial_domain(?INITIAL_DOMAIN_USER, Config).
   73: 
   74: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config0) ->
   75:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config0),
   76:     ejabberd_node_utils:backup_config_file(Config1),
   77:     run_config_file_modification_fun(Config1),
   78:     Config1.
   79: 
   80: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   81:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config),
   82:     ejabberd_node_utils:restore_config_file(Config),
   83:     ejabberd_node_utils:restart_application(ejabberd).
   84: 
   85: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   86: %% Tests
   87: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   88: 
   89: domain_should_change(Config) ->
   90:     %% GIVEN
   91:     NewHosts = ?config(new_hosts_value, Config),
   92:     ?assertNot(NewHosts == get_ejabberd_hosts()),
   93: 
   94:     %% WHEN
   95:     reload_through_ctl(Config),
   96: 
   97:     %% THEN
   98:     ?assertMatch(NewHosts, get_ejabberd_hosts()).
   99: 
  100: user_should_be_registered_and_unregistered_via_ctl(Config) ->
  101:     %% GIVEN
  102:     [NewHost] = ?config(new_hosts_value, Config),
  103:     ?assertMatch({cannot_register, _}, register_user_by_ejabberd_admin(
  104:                                          ?SAMPLE_USERNAME, NewHost)),
  105: 
  106:     %% WHEN
  107:     reload_through_ctl(Config),
  108: 
  109:     %% THEN
  110:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, register_user_by_ejabberd_admin(
  111:                             ?SAMPLE_USERNAME, NewHost)),
  112:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, unregister_user_by_ejabberd_admin(
  113:                             ?SAMPLE_USERNAME, NewHost)).
  114: 
  115: user_should_be_registered_and_unregistered_via_xmpp(Config) ->
  116:     %% GIVEN
  117:     UserDomain = get_user_domain(?RELOADED_DOMAIN_USER),
  118:     ?assert(lists:member(UserDomain, ?config(new_hosts_value, Config))),
  119: 
  120:     %% WHEN
  121:     reload_through_ctl(Config),
  122: 
  123:     %% THEN
  124:     ?assertMatch(ok, create_user(?RELOADED_DOMAIN_USER, Config)),
  125:     ?assertMatch({ok, result, _},
  126:                  delete_user(?RELOADED_DOMAIN_USER, Config)).
  127: 
  128: user_should_be_disconnected_from_removed_domain(Config) ->
  129:     %% GIVEN
  130:     Conn = connect_user(?INITIAL_DOMAIN_USER, Config),
  131: 
  132:     %% WHEN
  133:     reload_through_ctl(Config),
  134: 
  135:     %% THEN
  136:     ?assertNot(escalus_connection:is_connected(Conn)).
  137: 
  138: 
  139: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  140: %% Internal functions
  141: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  142: 
  143: get_ejabberd_hosts() ->
  144:     ejabberd_node_utils:call_fun(ejabberd_config, get_global_option, [hosts]).
  145: 
  146: reload_through_ctl(Config) ->
  147:     OutputStr = ejabberd_node_utils:call_ctl(reload_local, Config),
  148:     ok = verify_reload_output(OutputStr).
  149: 
  150: verify_reload_output(OutputStr) ->
  151:     ExpectedOutput = ?CTL_RELOAD_OUTPUT_PREFIX,
  152:     case lists:sublist(OutputStr, length(ExpectedOutput)) of
  153:         ExpectedOutput ->
  154:             ok;
  155:         _ ->
  156:             ct:pal("~ts", [OutputStr]),
  157:             error(config_reload_failed, [OutputStr])
  158:     end.
  159: 
  160: register_user_by_ejabberd_admin(User, Host) ->
  161:     ejabberd_node_utils:call_fun(ejabberd_admin, register,
  162:                                  [User, Host, <<"doctor">>]).
  163: 
  164: unregister_user_by_ejabberd_admin(User, Host) ->
  165:     ejabberd_node_utils:call_fun(ejabberd_admin, unregister, [User, Host]).
  166: 
  167: change_domain_in_config_file(Config) ->
  168:     ejabberd_node_utils:modify_config_file(
  169:       [mk_value_for_hosts_pattern(?RELOADED_DOMAIN)], Config).
  170: 
  171: mk_value_for_hosts_pattern(Domain) ->
  172:     {hosts, "[\"" ++ binary_to_list(Domain) ++ "\"]"}.
  173: 
  174: run_config_file_modification_fun(Config) ->
  175:     Fun = ?config(modify_config_file_fun, Config),
  176:     Fun(Config).
  177: 
  178: create_user_in_initial_domain(User, Config) ->
  179:     escalus:create_users(Config, {by_name, [User]}).
  180: 
  181: delete_user_in_initial_domain(User, Config) ->
  182:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, [User]}).
  183: 
  184: connect_user(User, Config) ->
  185:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, User),
  186:     {ok, Conn, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(UserSpec),
  187:     Conn.
  188: 
  189: get_user_domain(User) ->
  190:     {User, UserSpec} = escalus_users:get_user_by_name(User),
  191:     proplists:get_value(server, UserSpec).
  192: 
  193: create_user(User, Config) ->
  194:     {User, UserSpec} = escalus_users:get_user_by_name(User),
  195:     Result = escalus_users:create_user(Config, {User, UserSpec}),
  196:     escalus_users:verify_creation(Result).
  197: 
  198: delete_user(User, Config) ->
  199:     {User, UserSpec} = escalus_users:get_user_by_name(User),
  200:     escalus_users:delete_user(Config, {User, UserSpec}).
